intro: Epimedium coactum var. longtouhum, commonly known as the Longtouhu Epimedium, is a rare and ornamental plant native to China. It belongs to the Berberidaceae family and is characterized by its distinctive, leathery, evergreen foliage. The plant produces small, yellowish-green flowers that bloom in early spring, adding visual interest to the landscape. It thrives in partial shade and well-drained soil, making it suitable for woodland gardens. Due to its limited distribution and unique appearance, it is often cultivated for its aesthetic and ecological value.
